name: Ice
description:
Weapon has the Ice element and Mt +1, Hit -10, and Crit +10. After combat that this unit initiated, for each hit, create up to one @{tile}{Frost Patch} or, on a crit, @{tile}{Ice Block}, adjacent to target foe.

Disabled on non-Reason weapons and weapons with #{attribute}{Fire}, #{attribute}{Lightning}, and #{attribute}{Wind}
